attributes.action: Look into Breast Cancer Screening for those of any age
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have a friend who is 29 and her sister has been diagnosed as having invasive breast cancer. As you can imagine this is a distressing time for all of those involved.  But even more so for my friend who has been refused screening.  How can this be?  Every one should be entitled to screening to give peace of mind to that person who is at a high risk.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Look into Breast Cancer Screening for those of any age."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16888


Prime Minister's Office
